sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>creeper</radical> inside of a <radical>cape</radical>, who are they? They’re the <kanji>director</kanji> of a movie. They try to look all mysterious, but you know it’s just so people go see their movies and think they’re cool. Really they’re just a creep deep down.
meaningInfo: Picture the creepiest director you know. Wearing a cloak and cackling as he directs your favorite actors.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>director</kanji> is currently directing a movie about <reading>shee</reading>p (<ja>し</ja>). He keeps petting them and talking to them like they're humans.
readingInfo: The creep director gets really into whatever his current project is. Picture him wearing a sheep costume with the cape over it, petting and whispering to his sheep cast.
